meanings.definition: Stick fast to (a surface or substance).
meanings.sent1: The sticker adheres to the paper.
meanings.sent2: The tape adheres well to the wall.
meanings.sent3: The glue decided to adhere only to my fingers, making them stick together.
meanings.sent4: Her loyalty adheres to her like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The magnet's pull adheres to the metal with a strong bond.

meanings.definition: Believe in and follow the practices of.
meanings.sent1: She adheres to the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: He adheres to his religious beliefs faithfully.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to adhere to the idea that it's the boss of the house.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work adheres to his every action.
meanings.sent5: The student's commitment adheres to her studies with unwavering determination.
